49  abstract public function _getFiles();

51  public function createModels($singleTable = null) {
52  $config = Startup::getConfig ();
53  \ob_start ();
54  (new DbModelsCreator ())->create ( $config, false, $singleTable );
55  $result = \ob_get_clean ();
56  $message = $this->showSimpleMessage ( "", "success", "Models creation", "check mark", null, "msg-create-models" );
57  $message->addList ( \explode ( "\n", \str_replace ( "\n\n", "\n", \trim ( $result ) ) ) );
58  $this->models ( true );
59  echo $message;
60  }
61 
62  protected function _checkStep($niveau = null) {
63  $nbChecked = 1;
64  $niveauMax = $niveau;
65  if (! isset ( $niveau ))
66  $niveauMax = $this->activeStep - 1;
67  $steps = $this->getModelSteps ();
68  while ( $nbChecked <= $niveauMax && $this->hasNoError () && isset ( $steps [$nbChecked] ) ) {
69  $this->_modelCheckOneNiveau ( $steps [$nbChecked] [1] );
70  $nbChecked ++;
71  }
72  if ($this->hasError () && ! isset ( $niveau )) {
73  $this->activeStep = $nbChecked - 1;
74  $this->steps [$this->engineering] [$this->activeStep] [0] = "warning sign red";
75  }
76  }
77 
78  protected function _modelCheckOneNiveau($name) {
79  $config = Startup::getConfig ();
80  switch ($name) {
81  case "Conf" :
82  if ($this->missingKeyInConfigMessage ( "Database is not well configured in <b>app/config/config.php</b>", Startup::checkDbConfig () ) === false) {
83  $this->_addInfoMessage ( "settings", "Database is well configured" );
84  }
85  break;
86  case "Connexion" :
87  case "Database" :
88  $this->checkDatabase ( $config, "database" );
89  break;
90  case "Models" :
91  CacheManager::start ( $config );
92  $this->checkModels ( $config );
93  if ($this->engineering === "forward") {
94  $modelsWithoutFiles = $this->getModelsWithoutTable ( $config );
95  if (sizeof ( $modelsWithoutFiles ) > 0) {
96  foreach ( $modelsWithoutFiles as $model ) {
97  $table = Reflexion::getTableName ( $model );
98  $this->_addErrorMessage ( "warning", "The table <b>" . $table . "</b> does not exists for the model <b>" . $model . "</b>." );
99  }
100  }
101  }
102  break;
103  case "Cache" :
104  $this->checkModelsCache ( $config );
105  break;
106  }
107  }
108 
109  protected function checkDatabase($config, $infoIcon = "database") {
110  $db = $config ["database"];
111  if (! DAO::isConnected ()) {
112  $this->_addErrorMessage ( "warning", "connection to the database is not established (probably in <b>app/config/services.php</b> file)." );
113  try {
114  if ($db ["dbName"] !== "") {
115  $this->_addInfoMessage ( $infoIcon, "Attempt to connect to the database <b>" . $db ["dbName"] . "</b> ..." );
116  $db = new Database ( $db ["type"], $db ["dbName"], @$db ["serverName"], @$db ["port"], @$db ["user"], @$db ["password"], @$db ["options"], @$db ["cache"] );
117  $db->connect ();
118  }
119  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
120  $this->_addErrorMessage ( "warning", $e->getMessage () );
121  }
122  } else {
123  $this->_addInfoMessage ( $infoIcon, "The connection to the database <b>" . $db ["dbName"] . "</b> is established." );
124  }
125  }
126 
127  protected function checkModels($config, $infoIcon = "sticky note") {
128  if ($this->missingKeyInConfigMessage ( "Models namespace is not well configured in <b>app/config/config.php</b>", Startup::checkModelsConfig () ) === false) {
129  $modelsNS = @$config ["mvcNS"] ["models"];
130  $this->_addInfoMessage ( $infoIcon, "Models namespace <b>" . $modelsNS . "</b> is ok." );
131  $dir = UFileSystem::cleanPathname ( \ROOT . \DS . $modelsNS );
132  if (\file_exists ( $dir ) === false) {
133  $this->_addErrorMessage ( "warning", "The directory <b>" . $dir . "</b> does not exists." );
134  } else {
135  $this->_addInfoMessage ( $infoIcon, "The directory for models namespace <b>" . $dir . "</b> exists." );
136  $files = CacheManager::getModelsFiles ( $config, true );
137  if (\sizeof ( $files ) === 0) {
138  $this->_addErrorMessage ( "warning", "No file found in <b>" . $dir . "</b> folder." );
139  } else {
140  foreach ( $files as $file ) {
141  $completeName = ClassUtils::getClassFullNameFromFile ( $file );
142  $parts = \explode ( "\\", $completeName );
143  $classname = \array_pop ( $parts );
144  $ns = \implode ( "\\", $parts );
145  if ($ns !== $modelsNS) {
146  $this->_addErrorMessage ( "warning", "The namespace <b>" . $ns . "</b> would be <b>" . $modelsNS . "</b> for the class <b>" . $classname . "</b>." );
147  } else {
148  $this->_addInfoMessage ( $infoIcon, "The namespace for the class <b>" . $classname . "</b> is ok." );
149  }
150  }
151  }
152  }
153  }
154  }
155 
156  protected function getTablesWithoutModel($config) {
157  $models = CacheManager::getModels ( $config, true );
158  $tables = DAO::$db->getTablesName ();
159  $allJoinTables = Reflexion::getAllJoinTables ( $models );
160  $tables = array_diff ( $tables, $allJoinTables );
161  foreach ( $models as $model ) {
162  try {
163  $table = Reflexion::getTableName ( $model );
164  $tables = UArray::iRemove ( $tables, $table );
165  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
166  }
167  }
168  return $tables;
169  }
170 
171  protected function getModelsWithoutTable($config) {
172  $models = CacheManager::getModels ( $config, true );
173  $result = $models;
174  $tables = DAO::$db->getTablesName ();
175  $allJoinTables = Reflexion::getAllJoinTables ( $models );
176  $tables = array_diff ( $tables, $allJoinTables );
177  foreach ( $models as $model ) {
178  if (sizeof ( Reflexion::getAnnotationClass ( $model, "@transient" ) ) == 0) {
179  try {
180  $table = Reflexion::getTableName ( $model );
181  if ((UArray::iSearch ( $table, $tables, false )) !== false) {
182  $result = UArray::iRemoveOne ( $result, $model );
183  }
184  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
185  }
186  } else {
187  $result = UArray::iRemoveOne ( $result, $model );
188  }
189  }
190  return $result;
191  }
192 
193  protected function checkModelsCache($config, $infoIcon = "lightning") {
194  $instanceCache = CacheManager::$cache;
195  if ($instanceCache === null) {
196  $this->_addErrorMessage ( "warning", "Cache instance is not created." );
197  } else {
198  $this->_addInfoMessage ( $infoIcon, $instanceCache->getCacheInfo () );
199  if (CacheManager::$cache instanceof ArrayCache) {
200  $this->checkArrayCache ( $config, $infoIcon );
201  } else {
202  $this->checkModelsCacheFiles ( $config, $infoIcon );
203  }
204  }
205  }
206 
207  protected function checkArrayCache($config, $infoIcon = "lightning") {
208  if (! isset ( $config ["cache"] ) || UString::isNull ( $config ["cache"] )) {
209  self::missingKeyInConfigMessage ( "Cache directory is not well configured in <b>app/config/config.php</b>", [ "cache" ] );
210  } else {
211  if (! isset ( $config ["cache"] ["directory"] ) || UString::isNull ( $config ["cache"] ["directory"] )) {
212  self::missingKeyInConfigMessage ( "Cache directory is not well configured in <b>app/config/config.php</b>", [ "directory" ] );
213  } else {
214  $cacheDir = UFileSystem::cleanPathname ( \ROOT . \DS . $config ["cache"] ["directory"] );
215  $this->_addInfoMessage ( $infoIcon, "Models cache directory is well configured in config file." );
216  $cacheDirs = CacheManager::getCacheDirectories ( $config, true );
217  if (\file_exists ( $cacheDir ) === false) {
218  $this->_addErrorMessage ( "warning", "The cache directory <b>" . $cacheDir . "</b> does not exists." );
219  } else {
220  $modelsCacheDir = UFileSystem::cleanPathname ( $cacheDirs ["models"] );
221  $this->_addInfoMessage ( $infoIcon, "Cache directory <b>" . $cacheDir . "</b> exists." );
222  if (\file_exists ( $modelsCacheDir ) === false) {
223  $this->_addErrorMessage ( "warning", "The models cache directory <b>" . $modelsCacheDir . "</b> does not exists." );
224  } else {
225  $this->_addInfoMessage ( $infoIcon, "Models cache directory <b>" . $modelsCacheDir . "</b> exists." );
226  $this->checkModelsCacheFiles ( $config, $infoIcon );
227  }
228  }
229  }
230  }
231  }
232 
233  protected function checkModelsCacheFiles($config, $infoIcon = "lightning") {
234  CacheManager::startProd ( $config );
235  $files = CacheManager::getModelsFiles ( $config, true );
236  foreach ( $files as $file ) {
237  $classname = ClassUtils::getClassFullNameFromFile ( $file );
238  if (! CacheManager::modelCacheExists ( $classname )) {
239  $this->_addErrorMessage ( "warning", "The models cache entry does not exists for the class <b>" . $classname . "</b>." );
240  } else {
241  $this->_addInfoMessage ( $infoIcon, "The models cache entry for <b>" . $classname . "</b> exists." );
242  }
243  }
244  }
245 
246  protected function displayAllMessages() {
247  if ($this->hasNoError ()) {
248  $this->_addInfoMessage ( "checkmark", "everything is fine here" );
249  }
250  if ($this->hasMessages ()) {
251  $messagesElmInfo = $this->displayModelsMessages ( $this->hasNoError () ? "success" : "info", $this->messages ["info"] );
252  echo $messagesElmInfo;
253  }
254  if ($this->hasError ()) {
255  $messagesElmError = $this->displayModelsMessages ( "error", $this->messages ["error"] );
256  echo $messagesElmError;
257  }
258  $this->showActions ();
259  }
260 
261  protected function showActions() {
262  $buttons = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlButtonGroups ( "step-actions" );
263  $step = $this->getActiveModelStep ();
264  switch ($step [1]) {
265  case "Conf" :
266  $buttons->addItem ( "Show config file" )->getOnClick ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_config", "#action-response" )->addIcon ( "settings" );
267  $buttons->addItem ( "Edit config file" )->addClass ( "orange" )->getOnClick ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/formConfig/ajax", "#action-response" )->addIcon ( "edit" );
268  break;
269  case "Connexion" :
270  case "Database" :
271  if ($this->engineering === "reverse")
272  $buttons->addItem ( "(Re-)Create database" )->getOnClick ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/showDatabaseCreation", "#main-content" )->addIcon ( "database" );
273  break;
274  case "Models" :
275  if ($this->engineering === "forward") {
276  if (sizeof ( $tables = $this->getTablesWithoutModel ( Startup::getConfig () ) )) {
277  $ddBtn = new HtmlDropdown ( "ddTables", "Create models for new tables", array_combine ( $tables, $tables ) );
278  $ddBtn->asButton ();
279  $ddBtn->getOnClick ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/createModels", "#main-content", [ "attr" => "data-value" ] );
280  $buttons->addItem ( $ddBtn );
281  }
282  $buttons->addItem ( "(Re-)Create all models" )->getOnClick ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/createModels", "#main-content", [ "attr" => "" ] )->addIcon ( "sticky note" );
283  } else {
284  $buttons->addItem ( "Import from Yuml" )->getOnClick ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_importFromYuml", "#models-main", [ "attr" => "" ] )->addIcon ( "sticky note" );
285  }
286  $bt = $buttons->addItem ( "Classes diagram" )->getOnClick ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_showAllClassesDiagram", "#action-response", [ "attr" => "","ajaxTransition" => "random" ] );
287  $bt->addIcon ( "sticky note outline" );
288  if ($this->hasError ())
289  $bt->addClass ( "disabled" );
290  break;
291  case "Cache" :
292  $buttons->addItem ( "(Re-)Init all models cache" )->getOnClick ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_initModelsCache", "#main-content" )->addIcon ( "lightning" );
293  break;
294  }
295  $nextStep = $this->getNextModelStep ();
296  if (isset ( $nextStep )) {
297  $bt = $buttons->addItem ( $nextStep [1] );
298  $bt->addIcon ( "angle double right", false );
299  $bt->addLabel ( $nextStep [2], true, $nextStep [0] );
300  $bt->getContent () [1]->addClass ( "green" );
301  if ($this->hasNoError ()) {
302  $bt->getOnClick ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_loadModelStep/" . $this->engineering . "/" . ($this->activeStep + 1), "#models-main" );
303  } else {
304  $bt->addClass ( "disabled" );
305  }
306  } else {
307  $bt = $buttons->addItem ( "See datas" )->addClass ( "black" );
308  $bt->addIcon ( "unhide" );
309  if ($this->hasNoError ()) {
310  $bt->getOnClick ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/models/noHeader/", "#models-main" );
311  } else {
312  $bt->addClass ( "disabled" );
313  }
314  }
315  echo "<div>" . $buttons . "</div><br>";
316  echo "<div id='action-response'></div>";
317  }
318 
319  protected function missingKeyInConfigMessage($message, $keys) {
320  if (\sizeof ( $keys ) > 0) {
321  $this->_addErrorMessage ( "warning", $message . " : parameters <b>[" . \Ajax\service\JArray::implode ( ",", $keys ) . "]</b> are required." );
322  return true;
323  }
324  return false;
325  }

327  protected function _addErrorMessage($type, $content) {
328  $this->_addMessage ( "error", $type, $content );
329  }
330 
331  protected function _addInfoMessage($type, $content) {
332  $this->_addMessage ( "info", $type, $content );
333  }
334 
335  protected function _addMessage($key, $type, $content) {
336  $this->messages [$key] [] = new InfoMessage ( $type, $content );
337  }
338 
339  protected function hasError() {
340  return \sizeof ( $this->messages ["error"] ) > 0;
341  }
342 
343  protected function hasNoError() {
344  return \sizeof ( $this->messages ["error"] ) == 0;
345  }
346 
347  protected function hasMessages() {
348  return \sizeof ( $this->messages ["info"] ) > 0;
349  }
350 
351  protected function displayMessages($type, $messagesToDisplay, $header = "", $icon = "") {
352  $messagesElm = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlMessage ( "modelsMessages-" . $type );
353  $messagesElm->addHeader ( $header );
354  if ($this->hasError () && $type === "info")
355  $messagesElm->setIcon ( "info circle" );
356  else
357  $messagesElm->setIcon ( $icon );
358  $messages = [ ];
359  foreach ( $messagesToDisplay as $msg ) {
360  $elm = new HtmlSemDoubleElement ( "", "li", "", $msg->getContent () );
361  $elm->addIcon ( $msg->getType () );
362  $messages [] = $elm;
363  }
364  $messagesElm->addList ( $messages );
365  $messagesElm->addClass ( $type );
366  return $messagesElm;
367  }
368 }
